name: PM Kisan Samman Nidhi
description: Provides ₹6000 per year in three installments to small and marginal farmers.

name: Sukanya Samriddhi Yojana
description: A small deposit scheme for the girl child to meet her education and marriage expenses.

name: PM Awas Yojana (Urban)
description: Provides central assistance to urban local bodies for providing houses to eligible families.

name: UP Old Age Pension Scheme
description: Financial assistance for senior citizens residing in Uttar Pradesh.

name: Post-Matric Scholarship for Minorities
description: Financial support for students belonging to minority communities pursuing higher education.

name: Maharashtra Kanya Bhagyashree Kadak
description: Financial incentive for the birth of a girl child to families in Maharashtra.

name: Atal Pension Yojana
description: A pension scheme mainly aimed at the unorganized sector like domestic helps and drivers.

name: National Disability Pension
description: Monthly financial assistance for persons with more than 80% disability.

name: Pradhan Mantri Mudra Yojana
description: Loans up to 10 Lakhs for non-corporate non-farm small/micro enterprises.

name: Bihar Student Credit Card Scheme
description: Low-interest education loans for students in Bihar for higher studies.

name: PM Matru Vandana Yojana
description: Maternity benefit of ₹5000 for pregnant and lactating mothers for the first child.

name: NREGA - Job Card
description: Guarantees 100 days of wage employment in a financial year to a rural household.

name: Delhi Ladli Scheme
description: Financial assistance to the girl child born in Delhi to promote education.

name: Free Coaching for SC and OBC Students
description: Coaching for competitive exams for students belonging to SC and OBC categories.
